testcase.name: Proceed to checkout as guest user
Add a product to the cart from the product details page
Proceed to checkout by Buy Now
Remove a product from the cart
Proceed to checkout

Scenario: Proceed to checkout # src/test/resources/features/proceed_to_checkout_from_cart.feature:11 Given the user is logged in # steps.LoginSteps.the_user_is_logged_in() And the user is on the home page # steps.AddProductToCartSteps.the_user_is_on_the_home_page() When the user selects a product from the product list # steps.AddProductToCartSteps.the_user_selects_a_product_from_the_product_list() And the user navigates to the product details page # steps.AddProductToCartSteps.the_user_navigates_to_the_product_details_page() And the product is available # steps.AddProductToCartSteps.the_product_is_available() And the user adds the product to the cart # steps.AddProductToCartSteps.the_user_adds_the_product_to_the_cart() When the user navigates to the cart page # steps.AddProductToCartSteps.the_user_navigates_to_the_cart_page() And the user proceeds to checkout # steps.CheckoutSteps.the_user_proceeds_to_checkout() Then user navigate to checkout page # steps.CheckoutSteps.user_navigate_to_checkout_page() org.openqa.selenium.UnhandledAlertException: Unexpected alert dialog detected. And the checkout page should display the correct product and price details # steps.CheckoutSteps.the_checkout_page_should_display_the_correct_product_and_price_details() And user pick existing address # steps.CheckoutSteps.user_pick_existing_address() And the user accepts the terms and conditions # steps.CheckoutSteps.the_user_accepts_the_terms_and_conditions() And the user clicks the continue button # steps.CheckoutSteps.the_user_clicks_the_continue_button() Then the user should be able to see the confirm order page # steps.CheckoutSteps.the_user_should_be_able_to_see_the_confirm_order_page() And the user confirms the order # steps.CheckoutSteps.the_user_confirms_the_order() Then the user navigates to the success page # steps.CheckoutSteps.the_user_navigates_to_the_success_page() And user click continue button # steps.CheckoutSteps.user_click_continue_button()
